Name.BusinessNameLine1: MISSOURI WESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROMOTE PRIVATE GIVING AND HELP THE UNIVERSITY MOVE INTO THE FOREFRONT OF PUBLIC HIGHER EDUCATION.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE MISSOURI WESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION THAT FUNCTIONS SOLELY TO SUPPORT THE MISSION OF MISSOURI WESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY, AS STATED IN THE UNIVERSITY'S MISSION STATEMENT. THE FOUNDATION RECEIVES, INVESTS, MAINTAINS AND ADMINISTERS CONTRIBUTED RESOURCES; AND OTHERWISE ACTS TO FURTHER THE MISSION AND GOALS OF MISSOURI WESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY BY DIRECTING ACQUIRED RESOURCES TO SERVE THE UNIVERSITY AND, ITS STUDENTS.
IRS990.Description: CONTRIBUTIONS TO SUPPORT PROJECTS FOR AND SCHOLARSHIPS FOR STUDENTS ATTENDING MISSOURI WESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY.

IRS990ScheduleA.GeneralExplanation: Schedule A, Part II, Line 10, Explanation of Other Income: GROSS FUNDRAISING REVENUE

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE FOUNDATION'S ENDOWMENTS CONSIST OF 145 FUNDS ESTABLISHED TO SUPPORT A VARIETY OF SCHOLARSHIPS, PROGRAMS, AND DEPARTMENTS AT MISSOURI WESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: On June 1, 2009, the Foundation adopted the Financial Accounting Standards Board's new accounting requirements for accounting for uncertain tax positions. Under these new requirements, a tax position that meets the more-likely-than not recognition threshold is initially and subsequently measured as the largest amount of tax benefit that has a greater than 50 percent likelihood of being realized upon settlement with a taxing authority that has full knowledge of all relevant information. The Foundation determined that it was not required to record a liability for unrecognized tax benefits as a result of implementing the new requirements.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS DISCUSS AND REVIEW ALL GRANTS AND ALLOCATIONS. THE RECIPIENT OF ALL GRANTS AND ALLOCATIONS IS MISSOURI WESTERN STATE UNIVERSITY. THE UNIVERSITY WAS ORGANIZED TO PROVIDE ALL ASPECTS OF HIGHER EDUCATION. IN ALL INSTANCES THE GRANTS AND ALLOCATIONS ARE MADE WITHIN THE FRAMEWORK OF THE DONOR TO THE FOUNDATION.

Form990ScheduleMPartII.Identifier: Method for Determining Number of Contributors:
Form990ScheduleMPartII.Explanation: NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTORS BASED ON DONORS, NOT NUMBER OF ITEMS DONATED

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: BOARD MEMBERS JUDY HAUSMAN AND CINDY HAUSMAN ARE RELATED BY MARRIAGE

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: PRIOR TO FINALIZING, THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE FOUNDATION'S GOVERNING BODY FOR REVIEW AND COMMENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES STAFF AND BOARD MEMBERS TO PROVIDE A WRITTEN LETTER TO DOCUMENT POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST ISSUES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Compensation for top management and other key officials of the Missouri Western State University Foundation is processed through the Missouri Western State University payroll system. The compensation is based on current market conditions and reviewed by Human Resources at the University. This review includes, but is not limited to established University pay classifications and salary ranges.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING AND OTHER PERTINENT DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COMMITTEE THAT ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR AUDIT OVERSIGHT AND THE SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THE PROCESS IS CONSISTENT WITH WHAT HAS BEEN IN PLACE IN PRIOR PERIODS.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR MWSU AND STUDENTS
